items.sentence: Tom hid the gold coins where he thought no one would find them.
Tom hid the gold coins where he thought nobody would find them.
Tom hoped the video he just uploaded to YouTube would go viral.
Tom invited me to stay at his place in Boston for spring break.
Tom said that he had eaten too much and didn\'t feel very good.
Tom disappeared into his bedroom, slamming the door behind him.
When I opened the refrigerator, I noticed the meat had spoiled.
Tom\'s family often runs out of food near the end of the month.
Tom\'s head was smashed in with a crowbar or something similar.
Tom didn\'t want me to tell you this, but he just lost his job.
